tool.help:
**Tool Information**
Sequences Source URL: http://sourceforge.net/projects/primer3/ Release date: 2013-10-28 (version 2.3.6)
**Authors**
Get Sequnces: Iyad Kandalaft Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
SeqDB Web Services: Nazir El-Kayssi Nazir.El-Kayssi@agr.gc.ca Agriculture and Agri-foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
SeqDB: Christopher Lewis, Satpal Bilkhu, Nazir El-Kayssi, et al. mbb@agr.gc.ca Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
**Description**
Pulls a list of sequences from Sequence Database given a list of Sequence Identifiers. The file containing the sequence identifier must contain one identifier per line. Empty lines are ignored.
**Inputs and Outputs**
- Input - The input consists of a file containing sequence identifiers (one identifier per line). Empty lines are ignored.
- Output - SeqDB Sequences - Fasta file of sequences matching the identifiers in the list provided. Missing Sequences - A text file containing a list of sequences that could not be retrieved.
